text: 14.18: Jol 3.13; VB 16.8Gu mbaram garav, harigi enser mbe, ana Fhe Bakɨme nzuav ofari mbui artar han kega zi. Mba enser, ana vhava gari ŋaar ki. Ana khɨrɨp, mba guigira bɨrgi kos suirigi enser kaav, khaŋ ana nzuai, “Kha nuianan ki wain vhɨgi za gɨvigi, ndu maaŋ muuŋgiap mba won kos bɨrtɨga ndigip, kha nuianan ki wain vhɨgi gorɨv, nta ndi phogar vho.”
